thread.title: Inter Milan extends contract with defender Matteo Darmian until 2025
thread.title_full: Inter Milan extends contract with defender Matteo Darmian until 2025

title: Inter Milan extends contract with defender Matteo Darmian until 2025
text:
Sports
Inter Milan extends contract with defender Matteo Darmian until 2025
His continuous growth has made him one of the pillars of the team, says statement
ISTANBUL
Italian defender Matteo Darmian on Saturday renewed his contract with Inter Milan until June 30, 2025.
Inter Milan heaped praises on Darmian in a statement, saying: "If the word 'Darmian' existed in the dictionary, this is what it'd mean: 'to adapt to every match situation and immediately become a hugely reliable presence, guaranteeing extraordinary performances.
"His continuous growth has made him one of the pillars of the team, and he'll continue to be a key figure in the coming years."
Darmian led the Nerazzurri to win the 2021 Italian Serie A title and the Supercoppa Italiana and Coppa Italia twice.
In an interview with the club website, the 34-year-old said "I'm honored to have signed a deal," and "really proud to represent Inter." He added that he was happy to have the trust of the coaching staff, teammates and fans.
